get.summary: Obtain the BRC20 holding list by address, including information such as ticker, balance, etc.
Obtain the BRC20 holding list by address, including information such as ticker, balance, etc.
Retrieve the BRC20 token by address, including available balance, transferable balance, number of transferable Inscriptions, and the first few Inscriptions, etc.
Retrieve BRC20 Inscriptions list by address
Obtain details through the Inscription ID and return the legal status of the inscription in the swap module.

post.summary: Verify the legitimacy of commit inscription

get.summary: Retrieve the token inside the BRC20 Module by address, including available balance, transferable balance, number of transferable Inscriptions, and the first few Inscriptions, etc.
Retrieve the transaction history of BRC20 by module, including information such as address, balance, and minting.
Obtain the latest block height of BRC20
Obtain the token list of BRC20
Obtain the BRC20 token list, including information such as the number of holders, total issuance, etc.
Obtain BRC20 token information in batches, including the number of holders, total issuance, and other information.
Retrieve the list of BRC20 holders by ticker, including information such as address, balance, etc.
Obtain BRC20 token information, including the number of holders, total circulation, and other information.

brc20.description: BRC20 information, included only for valid transfers

height.description: Height at which the inscription was packed

inSatoshi.description: Total input amount in the GenesisTx

inscriptionIndex.description: Current inscription index, indicating the sequence of repetition, 0 for first occurrence

outSatoshi.description: Total output amount in the GenesisTx

isBRC20.description: Indicates if the NFT is BRC20

moved.description: Indicates if the NFT has been moved after creation

sequence.description: If sequence > 0, the NFT has been moved after creation

codeType.description: Script type of the current output: 0: None, 1: FT, 2: Unique, 3: NFT, 4: CodeType_P2PK, 5: CodeType_P2PKH, 6: CodeType_P2SH, 7: CodeType_P2WPKH, 8: CodeType_P2WSH, 9: CodeType_P2TR

height.description: Block height where the transaction is packed

idx.description: Sequence number in the block of the spent txid

inscriptions.description: Positions of all inscriptions on the utxo

isOpInRBF.description: Indicates if the current transaction is an RBF (Replace-By-Fee) transaction

isSpent.description: Indicates if the current transaction has been spent in the mempool

scriptPk.description: Lock script of the current output

scriptType.description: Script type of the current output
